医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
针对最常见的 SARS-CoV-2 变体的基于抗原的快速诊断测试的分析和临床评估最近的一项研究评估了 Ag-RDT 对最流行的 BA.5 Omicron 亚谱系的敏感性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Analytical-and-clinical-evaluation-of-antigen-based-rapid-diagnostic-tests-against-the-most-encountered-SARS-CoV-2-变体.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Analytical-and-clinical-evaluation-of-antigen-based-rapid-diagnostic-tests-against-the-most-encountered-SARS-CoV-2-变体.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=571db77e-b5e4-493b-880f-2f1854f6b429 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 05:24:00 -0400 Analytical and clinical evaluation of antigen-based rapid diagnostic tests against the most encountered SARS-CoV-2 variants
1990 年至 2019 年间，因接触二手烟而死亡的人数有所增加研究人员估计了二手烟（SHS）暴露的流行率并评估了其趋势https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/The-number-of-deaths-attributable-to-second-hand-smoke-exposure-has-increased- Between-1990-and-2019.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/The-number-of-deaths-attributable-to-second-hand-smoke-exposure-has-increased- Between-1990-and-2019.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98fedaed-2ed0-4253-ac72-50b8459ff8f1 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 05:13:00 -0400 The number of deaths attributable to second hand smoke exposure has increased between 1990 and 2019
研究探讨产后精神病的家族风险最近的一项研究探讨了遗传学与产后精神病之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Study-explores-the-familial-risk-of-postpartum-psychosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Study-explores-the-familial-risk-of-postpartum-psychosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46cf210f-3591-4117-b2a2-381e6647a386 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 05:07:00 -0400 Study explores the familial risk of postpartum psychosis
鼻内施用基于 SARS-CoV-2 RBD 的纳米颗粒疫苗可提供针对肺部病理学和病毒载量的保护在最近的一项研究中，美国俄亥俄州立大学的研究人员开发了一种鼻内亚单位疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Intranasally-administered-SARS-CoV-2-RBD-based-nanoarticle-vaccine-provides-protection-against-lung-pathology-and-viral-load。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Intranasally-administered-SARS-CoV-2-RBD-based-nanoarticle-vaccine-provides-protection-against-lung-pathology-and-viral-load。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce8f2cd9-29ac-4e13-9803-619b252e7319 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 04:57:00 -0400 Intranasally administered SARS-CoV-2 RBD-based nanoparticle vaccine provides protection against lung pathology and viral load
抗流感疫苗可以预防 SARS-CoV-2 感染吗？研究人员进行了一项荟萃分析，以评估流感疫苗接种对 SARS-CoV-2 感染的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Does-the-anti-influenza-vaccination-protect-against-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Does-the-anti-influenza-vaccination-protect-against-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=503bdc1f-a7dd-4d85-bd63-4dcdf5e8622f Wed, 02 Aug 2023 04:45:00 -0400 Does the anti-influenza vaccination protect against SARS-CoV-2 infection?
COVID-19 是否会增加未来胃肠道疾病的风险？科学家回顾了现有文献，以研究急性 COVID-19 与胃肠道症状发生率之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Does-COVID-19-increase-the-risk-of-future-胃肠道-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Does-COVID-19-increase-the-risk-of-future-胃肠道-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6dab614-3f7f-45f1-a90d-b8eef5afcc06 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 04:31:00 -0400 Does COVID-19 increase the risk of future gastrointestinal disorders?
癌症的沉默进展：研究深入探讨乳腺癌的进化线索研究人员进行了系统发育分析，以追踪乳腺癌和前驱病变的演变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Cancers-silent-progression-research-delves-into-evolutionary-clues-in-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Cancers-silent-progression-research-delves-into-evolutionary-clues-in-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0c9a1b7-3f8d-4af7-8f56-4b0d9750ee63 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 04:06:00 -0400 Cancer's silent progression: research delves into evolutionary clues in breast cancer
乳腺癌现在资助的研究旨在提高患有乳腺癌的黑人女性的护理质量在“Breast Cancer Now”的资助下，研究人员正在研究如何提高患有乳腺癌的黑人女性的护理质量并减少健康不平等。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Breast-Cancer-Now-funded-research-aims-to-improve-quality-of-care-for-black-women-with-breast-cancer。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Breast-Cancer-Now-funded-research-aims-to-improve-quality-of-care-for-black-women-with-breast-cancer。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3152547-b52b-4780-b801-ab9bffbb7d5d Wed, 02 Aug 2023 02:40:00 -0400 Breast Cancer Now-funded research aims to improve quality of care for black women with breast cancer
新疗法为患有罕见皮肤病的儿童带来希望这是一个美丽的绰号，但对于澳大利亚的“蝴蝶孩子”来说，它掩盖了一个毁灭性的现实，充满了由一种罕见的皮肤病——大疱性表皮松解症（EB）引起的巨大痛苦和痛苦。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/New-treatment-offers-hope-for-children-suffering-from-rare-skin-condition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/New-treatment-offers-hope-for-children-suffering-from-rare-skin-condition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76b93a1c-cc3d-45d2-83dc-bb33409d9e16 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 02:37:00 -0400 New treatment offers hope for children suffering from rare skin condition
饲养和照顾宠物可以支持失语症患者的沟通和福祉羽毛、鳍或毛皮，所有的宠物都能让我们感到更快乐。现在，南澳大利亚大学的新研究表明，饲养宠物和照顾宠物也可以支持沟通和福祉，特别是对于患有失语症等后天语言障碍的人来说。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Pet-ownership-and-care-can-support-communication-wellbeing-for-people-with-aphasia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Pet-ownership-and-care-can-support-communication-wellbeing-for-people-with-aphasia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b18750d0-d875-4f3c-baaa-5f40abb10849 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 02:34:00 -0400 Pet ownership and care can support communication, wellbeing for people with aphasia
